attributes.action: Remove 7am - 7pm all week restrictions to Bus Lane for Route 18
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Bus 18 runs from Euston station to Sudbury. The main issue is on Harrow Road, this is the only bus that uses this bus lane; however the bus lane restrictions are inflexible, running from 7am to 7pm on a daily basis. The travel via Harrow Road is horrendous over the weekends with new Wembley stadium and Wembley market. Please we need the restrictions reviewed as this will reduced the already congested route.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
